name: Snake Plant
description: Snake Plant is a popular houseplant known for its long, upright leaves with a pattern of green and yellow. It is easy to care for and is tolerant of low light conditions.
careInstructions: Place in indirect sunlight and water sparingly, allowing the soil to dry between waterings. Avoid overwatering.

name: Monstera Deliciosa
description: Monstera Deliciosa, also known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, is a popular tropical plant with large, fenestrated leaves. It adds a touch of exotic beauty to any indoor space.
careInstructions: Provide bright, indirect sunlight and water when the top inch of soil feels dry. Mist the leaves occasionally to increase humidity.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace Lily is a beautiful flowering plant that produces elegant white flowers. It is known for its air-purifying properties and is a popular choice for indoor environments.
careInstructions: Place in bright, indirect sunlight and keep the soil evenly moist. Mist the leaves occasionally to maintain humidity.

name: Spider Plant
description: Spider Plant is a resilient and versatile plant with arching leaves and small white flowers. It is easy to care for and produces plantlets that can be propagated.
careInstructions: Provide bright, indirect sunlight and water when the top inch of soil feels dry. Spider plants appreciate high humidity.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
description: Fiddle Leaf Fig is a popular indoor tree with large, glossy leaves. It makes a bold statement and adds a touch of elegance to any room.
careInstructions: Place in bright, indirect sunlight and water when the top inch of soil feels dry. Avoid moving the plant frequently.
